summary: Comprehensive testing of P0/P1 features completed. All 8 features tested and verified working: Dashboard Rating Impact (+150 gain shown), Milestone Banner with dismiss functionality (queued milestones work correctly), Focus Areas showing #1 Priority weakness, Lab Critical Only toggle with count and red styling, Summary tab Similar Pattern Detected section, and clickable similar games navigation.

dashboard_rating_impact.details: Rating Impact card shows '+150' with 'Fixing Relaxes when winning could save ~150 rating points' message. data-testid='rating-impact-card' present.

milestone_banner_display.details: Milestone banner shows 'MILESTONE UNLOCKED!' with milestone name, description, icon. data-testid='milestone-banner' present.

milestone_banner_dismiss.details: Clicking X dismisses current milestone and shows next in queue. localStorage stores dismissed milestone IDs. Tested with 'Clean Sheet' → 'On Fire' → 'Unstoppable' sequence.

focus_areas_top_weakness.details: Shows '#1 PRIORITY' label with 'One Move Blunders', '33 occurrences · Fix this first' call-to-action.

lab_critical_toggle_count.details: Critical Only toggle shows 'Critical (1)' count when active. data-testid='critical-toggle' present.

lab_critical_toggle_red.details: Toggle turns red (bg-red-500 class) when active.

lab_similar_pattern_section.details: Summary tab shows 'Similar Pattern Detected' section with Brain icon and 'You've made this same mistake in other games' text.

lab_similar_games_clickable.details: Similar games are clickable with data-testid='similar-game-0'. Clicking navigates to that game's Lab page.

seed_data_creation: None - used existing user data with 102 games, 44 analyzed
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0/P1 features implemented and working. Key components: MilestoneBanner (Dashboard.jsx lines 41-112) uses localStorage for dismissal state. Rating Impact comes from estimate_rating_impact in blunder_intelligence_service.py. Similar games from find_similar_pattern_games. Critical toggle in Lab.jsx line 575-581.
